description: Use the Azure Key Vault, not the Windows Certificate Store, to store the master key.Note: The Master Key Configuration page is where you set up your CMK (Column Master Key) and select the key store provider where the CMK will be stored.Currently, you can store a CMK in the Windows certificate store, Azure Key Vault, or a hardware security module (HSM).References:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sql-database/sql-database-always-encrypted-azure-key-vaultQuestion Set 1
